bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Automatic Reclosing of Line Circuit Breakers for AC Distribution and Transmission Lines
IEEE Guide for Automatic Reclosing of Line Circuit Breakers for AC Distribution and Transmission Lines

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Guidelines for the application of automatic reclosing facilities to circuit breakers are established. Decisions concerning the use of such facilities in specific cases are left to the user.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C37.104-2012 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.104-2002)
